content: the **mini basketweave stitch** or *rice stitch* is a fun and textured stitch with a solid but squishy fabric this pattern provides the **written instructions** **step-by-step photos** and a link to the **video tutorial** to make a mini basketweave afghan square in two sizes small and large *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 5 5-mm i/9 us 5 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** feel free to use any yarn that meets the gauge **size** **small** 7 18 cm **large** 8 20 cm **gauge** 14 5 sts for 11 row worked in pattern in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
